entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
